channel.title: Great newb questions
channel.description:
ok this might sound funny but i need tp know what a host is and wat it does get my no-ip to show up instead of me having to use 0.0.0.0 unlimited access to my server even when im off te computer and its off auto restart that restarts and saves every 30mins and the code so every1 can see this Owner Jalapeno842 has jus logged in and a working pickup command for slipknotscape and some1 to check to see if they can get on this server ip 0.0.0.0 hopefully itll bring u to my server which is from the source slipknotscape(i did not leech i even remodeled some stuff and about to do more)
plz answer all my questions

item.title: Great newb questions
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Please go to the tutorial section of the forums and read the top sticky. That will answer all of your questions related to hosting and IP’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Great newb questions
item.dc:creator: @Eonix Eonix
item.description:
@Eonix wrote:

ok dedicated means it stay on 24/7 you dont even have to keep ur computer on

when u made ur server u made a ip (ex. examplescape.no-ip.biz) thats how people log in

hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Great newb questions
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

The ip 0.0.0.0 connects to my server for me. It’s called localhost and only the owner can connect to it.
If owners run their servers, if they try to connect, they need to have a localhost ip or use no ip at all.
If I connect to 0.0.0.0 it goes to my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Great newb questions
item.dc:creator: @jalapeno842 jalapeno842
item.description:
@jalapeno842 wrote:

can u check if it works im gonna run it rite now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 07:45:57 PM[/size][hr]its up but can u answer my other questions please and tyvm

Read full topic

item.title: Great newb questions
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

The ip 0.0.0.0 is local host connect.
Same with 127.0.0.1

If you want to run your server while your computer is off, you need dedicated hosting.

Read full topic
